name: The House (itch) (discountcompost)
description:
The House is a collaborative story game for up to 6 players. You will draw a house and describe the things and people in it, their relationships to each other, their relationships to the objects, and their relationships to the house.

by Mason Weaver @discountcompost

edited by Jared Sinclair @infinite_mao

from an original idea by Jason @CRiMS0NREMAiNS

[Cover image by Edward Hopper, 1924]
